schedule.comment: Time format: HH:MM (24-hour format). Leave empty to start immediately

output.comment: Directory where PowerPoint reports will be saved. Can be relative or absolute path

tasks.prompt: Use the nano-banana model to create a 1/7 scale commercialised figure of the characters in the illustration, in a realistic style and environment. Place the figure on a computer desk, using a circular transparent acrylic base without any text. On the computer screen, display the Brush modelling process of the figure, Next to the computer screen, place a toy packaging box printed with the original artwork(or image) with the title "cyberlink".

additional_images.comment_additional_images: Optional: Paths to additional images for comparison or reference. Leave empty strings if not needed.

tasks.comment_task: Each task represents a folder containing images to process with Google Flash API

comments.folder_structure: Each task folder should contain a 'Source' subfolder with images to process
comments.output_structure: Generated outputs will be saved in 'Generated_Output' subfolder
comments.metadata_structure: Processing metadata will be saved in 'Metadata' subfolder
comments.supported_formats: Supported image formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, BMP, TIFF
comments.image_requirements: Images must be < 10MB and each side > 100px

api_parameters.prompt: Required string - the main prompt for analysis
api_parameters.image1: Main source image from Source folder (automatically handled)

api_returns.response_id: String - unique identifier for the response
api_returns.response_data: List of dictionaries containing response data with types 'Text' or 'Image'
